message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $12,000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay a bit less than the value to you, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which still gives you a good deal. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,750. Can we meet at this price?
